works.description: During the Salone del Mobile 2011 in Milan, luxury mosaic tile brand Bisazza paid homage to Alessandro Mendini with a unique exhibition at the Triennale. “Mendini-Bisazza // Works from the Bisazza Foundation” celebrated over 20 years of successful collaboration, and showcased works and installations from the Bisazza Foundation and a prestigious loan from the Foundation Cartier in Paris. The huge exhibit, designed by Atelier Mendini, highlighted amazing installations and sculptures covered with 24K yellow gold Bisazza mosaic tiles.
